summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 CHRYSLER 300. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE VEHICLE SHUT OFF WITHOUT WARNING NUMEROUS TIMES. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO COMMUNITY CHRYSLER DODGE JEEP RAM OF MARTINSVILLE (555 IN-37, MARTINSVILLE, IN 46151), BUT THEY WERE UNABLE TO DIAGNOSE THE FAILURE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED AND DID NOT ASSIST. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 120,000.
